page.title: 06A day at school
page.content:
I attend Weeton C. of E. primary school. On Thursday morning I arrived at school at 9 o'clock and read a book for 15 minutes. I then did three cards of S.M.P. maths. For once I got them all right! This was followed by 10 minutes of Hesse and calculator maths.
After lunch I had my piano lesson and helped Heather build our castle.
The afternoon seemed very long, but at last we tidied up and went out to play. Back in the classrooom, we sang "Black and Gold" and said the poem "The Old Wife and the Ghost". It was story time after that and our teacher read two chapters of the book.
We said our prayers and it was hometime. HURRAY!
